author: oheger
msg: CombinedConfigurationBuilder now evaluates default parameters for child
configuration sources and initializes child parameter objects correspondingly.

author: oheger
msg: Fixed a potential NPE in DefaultReloadingDetectorFactory.
The refreshDelay property of the parameters object can now be null.

author: oheger
msg: The property can be undefined, therefore the value null makes sense.

author: oheger
msg: CombinedBuilderParametersImpl now supports a way of adding default parameters for child configuration sources.
To a parameters object an arbitrary number of child parameter objects can be
added. These parameters are copied to parameter objects for child
configuration sources. So this is a convenient way to set default properties
for child configuration sources of a combined configuration builder.

author: luc
msg: Fixed wrong array dimensions in secondary equations handling.
